mapper.update: update cart set categoryname = #{categoryname}, no = #{no} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from category where id = #{id} AND goods_id = #{goodId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(goods_id, user_id, count, create_time) values (#{goodsId}, #{userId}, #{count}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select * from cart where user_id = #{userId} And goods_id = #{goodsId}
